Project Mailing Lists

These are the mailing lists that have been established for this project. For each list, there is a subscribe, unsubscribe, and an archive link.

Name Subscribe Unsubscribe Post Archive
Flume User List Subscribe Unsubscribe Post mail-archives.apache.org
Flume Developer List Subscribe Unsubscribe Post mail-archives.apache.org
Flume Commits Subscribe Unsubscribe Post mail-archives.apache.org
